project_name: Real-Time Chat and Video Calling Application

items.title: Real-Time Text Messaging
items.description: Enable users to send and receive text messages instantly between individuals or groups.
acceptance_criteria: Messages are delivered to recipients within 1 second under normal network conditions
Users can see sent, delivered, and read status indicators
Messages are displayed in correct chronological order
Supports group chats with up to 50 participants
non_functional: Latency under 1 second for message delivery

items.title: Video Calling Feature
items.description: Allow users to initiate and participate in one-to-one and group video calls in real-time.
acceptance_criteria: Users can start and receive video calls from their contact list
Video and audio quality remain stable with at least 720p resolution under standard broadband
Supports group video calls with up to 10 participants
Call connection time is under 3 seconds
non_functional: End-to-end encryption for video and audio streams

notes: Assumed that the application will support both one-to-one and group communication for text and video. No platform (web/mobile) specified, so requirements are platform-agnostic.
